title: The Bow
subtitle: Better Archery Through Excessive and Aggressive Spending

rangeInfo.announcement: It has finally happened -- Archery Range has been cleared and is available for use

sections.title: LOCATION
content: Park at Clubhouse and walk down path towards the ballfields. Small path on right is marked for Archery.

sections.title: OPENING
content: Log in with the Range Logbook
No range officer, however practice sensible safety practices
Crossbows are allowed, but it is up to the shooter to bring and use a suitable target.

sections.title: RESTRICTIONS
content: No broad heads or judo points

sections.title: CLOSING
content: Make suggestions for improvement or send email to become member of archery range committee

newEnglandInfo.title: New England Archery Info
presentationPrompts: captivate a General Meeting with a memorable bow competition or bow hunting expedition?
tell us about a memorable place you went bow hunting?
tell us about an unusual game you have gone after with a bow.
teach us about the techniques in the use of a bow and the necessary equipment?
tell us about the history of the bow, an archer in history, or the impact of the bow on history!

seo.title: The Bow - Wayland Rod & Gun Club Archery Range
seo.description: Information about the archery range at Wayland Rod & Gun Club, including range rules, location, hours, and New England archery resources.
